content: Viswanathan (Vishy) Anand (Chennai, December 11, 1969) is an Indian Grand Master. He was named "Indian Sportsman of the Millennium" and got 11 million children in his state, Tamil Nadhu, to study chess at school.
translations: ita:Viswanathan (Vishy) Anand (Chennai, 11 dicembre 1969) è un Gran Maestro indiano. È stato nominato sportivo indiano del m
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by carlosalberto (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
